SELECT r.*,p.* FROM ( SELECT a.id bedId,a.name bed_name,a.roomId ,b.name room_name,b.beid FROM bas_region_bed a,bas_operroom b WHERE a.roomId=b.operRoomId AND b.enable='1' AND b.roomType='02' AND a.status != -1 AND a.beid = #{beid} ) r LEFT JOIN ( SELECT anaes_pacu_rec.* FROM ( SELECT p.id,p.regOptId,p.pacuRoomId,p.processState,p.enterTime,p.exitTime,p.finishTime,p.leaveTo, p.portablePipe,p.anaesType,p.portableRes,p.portableResOther,p.stewardScore,p.docSign,p.nurseSign,p.anabioticState, b.operaDate,b.name,b.sex,b.age,b.ageMon,b.ageDay,b.hid,b.bed,b.regionName,p.bedId pacuBed,b.optLevel, (SELECT codeName FROM bas_sys_code WHERE bas_sys_code.groupId='operat_level' AND codeValue = b.optLevel AND beid = #{beid}) operat_level_name, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(NAME) FROM evt_opt_latter_diag s WHERE s.docId = d.anaRecordId ORDER BY s.optLatterDiagId) opt_latter_diag, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(NAME) FROM evt_opt_real_oper r WHERE r.docId = d.anaRecordId ORDER BY r.optRealOperId) opt_real_oper, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(NAME) FROM evt_real_anaes_method a WHERE a.docId = d.anaRecordId ORDER BY a.realAnaMedId ) anaes_method FROM doc_anaes_pacu_rec p,doc_anaes_record d ,bas_reg_opt b WHERE p.regOptId=b.regOptId AND (b.state = '05' OR b.state ='06') AND b.beid = #{beid} AND p.regOptId=d.regOptId ) anaes_pacu_rec WHERE anaes_pacu_rec.anabioticState = 1) p ON r.bedId = p.pacuBed WHERE 1=1 AND r.beid = #{beid} ORDER BY r.bed_name ASC
